item.title: Chinese Cabbage-collapsing cabbage in Suzhou
item.description: Everyday Sunson Asian markets put baskets of “Chinese cabbage” at the entrance of the store. It should be the most consumable vegetable for Chinese. Why do the Chinese love these cabbage so much? Because it has a special bond, especially it is rooted in Wu (Âê¥) culture.
